entry.title: Thursday: Near blizzard. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
